title: Deep Energetic Cleanse  Guided Meditation & Energy Healing — The Conscious Club
description: Come join us for a unique healing journey! Every month Charon & Elizabeth will share a beautiful guided meditation accompanied by a deep energetic cleanse.
cleaned_text: Deep Energetic Cleanse Guided meditation & energy healing Come join us for a unique healing journey! Every month Charon & Elizabeth will share a beautiful guided meditation accompanied by a deep energetic cleanse. This session is accessible for everyone, you are not required to have any meditation experience. All you have to do is lay down and let yourself be carried by the healing frequencies, spirit guides, Archangels, and spirit animals we are bringing to you on the mat. Know that we are specialists in Energetic Safety at The Conscious Club, so you are always in a safe environment to open up. Whatever worries you had about your day or month, come out feeling new and refreshed! We look forward to connecting with you! About the facilitators Charon Tolhuisen is co-owner of The Conscious Club and works with the ancient wisdom of the white witch and goddesses. She heals and empowers others on their journey by tuning in, doing bodywork and card readings. Elizabeth Plokker is co-owner of The Conscious Club and works in the background as a modern day shamanic healer and energetic architect. Born with a spiritual toolbox of claircognizance, clairsentience and clairvoyance her world opened to paranormal experiences at a very young age. She speaks ancient spiritual languages which enables her to transfer the source of darkness into light. Dates: » Wednesday the 28th of July // 20:00 -21:00 » Wednesday the 25th of August // 20:00 -21:00 » Wednesday the 22nd of September // 20:00 -21:00 » Wednesday the 27th of October // 20:00 -21:00 » Wednesday the 24th of November // 20:00 -21:00 » Wednesday the 22nd of Charon Tolhuisen & Elizabeth Plokker Date: Once a Month on a Wednesday Location: The Conscious Club - Zeeburgerpad 8, Amsterdam Time: 20:00 Price: €15.50 // Available with your 10-ride pass, 5-ride pass and New Member Introduction Card. For Onefit / ClassPass card members we have very limited spots available.
